text: Joanne Marie Platt (born 15 June 1973) is a British Labour and Co-operative politician who has been the Member of Parliament (MP) for Leigh and Atherton since 2024. She was previously MP for Leigh from 2017 to 2019. ==References== Category:1973 births Category:UK MPs 2017–2019 Category:Living people Category:UK MPs 2024–present Category:Politicians from Greater Manchester Category:Labour Party (UK) MPs
title: Jo Platt
